SELECT t1.brd_seq as brdSeq ,t1.brd_typ as brdTyp ,t2.title AS brdTypNm ,t1.root_seq as rootSeq ,t1.ref_seq as refSeq ,t1.DEPTH ,t1.passwd ,t1.title ,t1.hit ,t1.comm_cnt as commCnt ,t1.reply_cnt as replyCnt ,t1.user_nm as userNm ,CAST(t1.ins_dt ,'%Y.%m.%d %h:%m%i' ) AS insDt ,t1.ins_user as insUser ,t1.proc_st as procSt FROM BOM_BOARD_TB t1 JOIN BOM_CODE_TB t2 ON t1.brd_typ = t2.brd_typ WHERE t1.del_yn = 'F' AND brd_seq NOT IN #{noticeBrdSeq} AND t1.brd_typ = #srchBrdTyp#
